## lookAt variable

Constructs a 4x4 camera matrix for given `eye` position, look-at `target` (both in world space) and normalized `up` vector. Creates new matrix if `out` is `null`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lookAt: (out: import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec | null, eye: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, target: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, up: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec
```
